name: Squat
description: The squat is a compound exercise that primarily targets the muscles of the thighs, hips and buttocks. It is one of the best exercises for building lower body strength and power.

name: Lunge
description: The lunge is a unilateral lower body exercise that targets the muscles of the quads, glutes, and hamstrings. It can be performed with bodyweight or with added weight for increased resistance.

name: Deadlift
description: The deadlift is a compound exercise that targets the muscles of the legs, back, and core. It is an excellent exercise for building total body strength and power.

name: Leg Press
description: The leg press is a machine-based exercise that targets the muscles of the quads, hamstrings, and glutes. It can be a good alternative to squats for those with mobility or injury issues.

name: Calf Raise
description: The calf raise is an isolation exercise that targets the muscles of the calves. It can be performed with bodyweight or with added weight for increased resistance.

name: Leg Extension
description: The leg extension is a machine-based exercise that targets the muscles of the quads. It can be a good exercise for isolating the quads and improving their strength and size.

name: Hamstring Curl
description: The hamstring curl is a machine-based exercise that targets the muscles of the hamstrings. It can be a good exercise for isolating the hamstrings and improving their strength and size.

name: Front Squat
description: The front squat is a variation of the squat where the barbell is held in front of the body. It primarily targets the muscles of the quads, but also works the core and upper back.

name: Romanian Deadlift
description: The Romanian deadlift is a variation of the deadlift that primarily targets the muscles of the hamstrings and glutes. It is also a good exercise for improving hip mobility and flexibility.

name: Bench Press
description: The bench press is a compound exercise that primarily targets the muscles of the chest, shoulders, and triceps. It is one of the best exercises for building upper body strength and size.

name: Incline Bench Press
description: The incline bench press is a variation of the bench press that targets the upper portion of the chest. It is performed on a bench that is set at an incline, usually between 30 and 45 degrees.

name: Dumbbell Fly
description: The dumbbell fly is an isolation exercise that primarily targets the muscles of the chest. It can be performed with dumbbells or a cable machine for increased resistance.

name: Dumbbell Bench Press
description: The dumbbell bench press is a variation of the bench press that can help to increase unilateral strength and stability. It is performed with dumbbells instead of a barbell.

name: Chest Press Machine
description: The chest press machine is a weight machine that targets the muscles of the chest, shoulders, and triceps. It can be a good exercise for beginners or those with limited mobility.

name: Weighted Chest Dip
description: The weighted chest dip is a bodyweight exercise that can be made more challenging by adding weight. It primarily targets the muscles of the chest, shoulders, and triceps.

name: Cable Crossover
description: The cable crossover is an isolation exercise that targets the muscles of the chest. It is performed using a cable machine and can be a good exercise for developing the inner portion of the chest.

name: Cable Chest Press
description: The cable chest press is an exercise that targets the muscles of the chest, shoulders, and triceps. It is performed using a cable machine and can be a good exercise for increasing chest strength and stability.

name: Deadlift
description: The deadlift is a compound exercise that targets the muscles of the back, legs, and glutes. It is one of the best exercises for building overall strength and size.

name: Barbell Row
description: The barbell row is a compound exercise that primarily targets the muscles of the back, shoulders, and biceps. It is performed by lifting a barbell from the ground and pulling it towards your chest.

name: Lat Pulldown
description: The lat pulldown is an exercise that targets the muscles of the back and shoulders. It is performed using a cable machine and can be a good exercise for increasing upper body strength and size.

name: T-bar Row
description: The T-bar row is a compound exercise that primarily targets the muscles of the back, shoulders, and biceps. It is performed using a barbell or T-bar machine and can be a good exercise for building upper body strength and size.

name: Seated Cable Row
description: The seated cable row is an exercise that targets the muscles of the back, shoulders, and biceps. It is performed using a cable machine and can be a good exercise for increasing upper body strength and size.

name: One-Arm Dumbbell Row
description: The one-arm dumbbell row is an exercise that targets the muscles of the back, shoulders, and biceps. It is performed using a dumbbell and can be a good exercise for building unilateral strength and stability.

name: Hyperextension
description: The hyperextension is an exercise that targets the muscles of the lower back, glutes, and hamstrings. It is performed using a hyperextension bench or other equipment and can be a good exercise for improving lower back strength and stability.

name: Barbell Curl
description: The barbell curl is a classic biceps exercise that targets the muscles of the upper arms. It is performed by lifting a barbell with an underhand grip and curling it towards your chest.

name: Preacher Curl
description: The preacher curl is an isolation exercise that targets the biceps muscles. It is performed using a special bench that supports the arms and elbows and can be a good exercise for building muscle definition and size.

name: Concentration Curl
description: The concentration curl is an isolation exercise that targets the biceps muscles. It is performed using a dumbbell and can be a good exercise for building muscle definition and strength.

name: Hammer Curl
description: The hammer curl is an exercise that targets the biceps and forearm muscles. It is performed using dumbbells with a neutral grip and can be a good exercise for building overall arm strength and size.

name: Reverse Curl
description: The reverse curl is an exercise that targets the muscles of the forearms and biceps. It is performed using a barbell with an overhand grip and can be a good exercise for building overall arm strength and size.

name: Incline Dumbbell Curl
description: The incline dumbbell curl is a variation of the dumbbell curl that targets the biceps muscles. It is performed using a bench set at a slight incline and can be a good exercise for building upper arm strength and size.
